#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_info("ShardKv PUT called");
    if(GetRaftServer().isLeader == 0){
      Log_info("[PUT] I am not the leader %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else{
      // Coroutine::CreateRun([this, oid, k, v, &timeout]() {
        uint64_t index;
        uint64_t term;
        auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
        cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
        cmd->data_.push_back("put");
        cmd->data_.push_back(k);
        cmd->data_.push_back(v);
        auto marshallableCmd = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);
        /*
        probably should've done this in kv server also. but i think im waiting long enough such that all commits happen xD
        */
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);
        put_f=false;


        auto resp = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableCmd, &index, &term);
        // Log_info("THIS IS %d %d", index, term);
        Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
        if(put_f == true){
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        }
      // });
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_info("ShardKv APPEND called");
    if(GetRaftServer().isLeader == 0){
      Log_info("[Append] I am not the leader %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else{
      // Coroutine::CreateRun([this, oid, k, v, &timeout]() {
        uint64_t index;
        uint64_t term;
        auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
        cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
        cmd->data_.push_back("append");
        cmd->data_.push_back(k);
        cmd->data_.push_back(v);
        auto marshallableCmd = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);
        /*
        probably should've done this in kv server also. but i think im waiting long enough such that all commits happen xD
        */
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);
        app_f=false;


        auto resp = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableCmd, &index, &term);
        // Log_info("THIS IS %d %d", index, term);
        Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
        if(app_f == true){
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        }
      // });
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_info("ShardKv GET called");
    if(GetRaftServer().isLeader == 0){
      Log_info("[GET] I am not the leader %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else{
      // Coroutine::CreateRun([this, oid, k, v, &timeout]() {
        uint64_t index;
        uint64_t term;
        auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
        cmd->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
        cmd->data_.push_back("get");
        cmd->data_.push_back(k);
        // cmd->data_.push_back(*v);
        auto marshallableCmd = std::static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(cmd);
        /*
        probably should've done this in kv server also. but i think im waiting long enough such that all commits happen xD
        */
        std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);
        get_f=false;
        auto resp = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableCmd, &index, &term);
        Coroutine::Sleep(400000);
        // Log_info("[%d] THIS IS %d %d", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, index, term);
        if(get_f == true){
          *v = kv_store_[k];
          return KV_SUCCESS;
        }
      // });
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
    /* your code here */
    auto data = v->data_;
    if(data[1] == "put"){
      Log_info("PUTT %d [%s:%s]!", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, data[2].c_str(), data[3].c_str());
      kv_store_[data[2]] = data[3];
      std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);
      put_f=true;
    }
    else if(data[1] == "append"){
      Log_info("APPEND %d [%s:%s]!", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, data[2].c_str(), data[3].c_str());
      // kv_store_[data[2]] += data[3];
      if (kv_store_.find(data[2]) != kv_store_.end()) {
        kv_store_[data[2]] += data[3];
      } 
      else {
        kv_store_[data[2]] = data[3];
      }
      std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);
      app_f=true;
    }
    else if(data[1] == "get"){
      Log_info("GET %d [%s]!", GetRaftServer().loc_id_, data[2].c_str());
      // data[3] = kv_store_[data[2]];
      std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(GetRaftServer().mtx_);


      get_f=true;
      // Log_info("I GOT %s %s %s", data[1].c_str(),data[2].c_str(),data[3].c_str());
    }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
